channel.title: CVE Feed for extendthemes -- Mesmerize
channel.description: The latest CVEs for extendthemes -- Mesmerize

item.title: CVE-2019-25142|2024-08-05T03:00:19.178Z -- extendthemes -- mesmerize
item.description: The Mesmerize & Materialis themes for WordPress are vulnerable to authenticated options change in versions up to, and including,1.6.89 (Mesmerize) and 1.0.172 (Materialis). This is due to 'companion_disable_popup' function only checking the nonce while sending user input to the 'update_option' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers to change otherwise restricted options.
